sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import farmImage from './assets/farmer-image.jpg'; // Import the farm image for hero section import riceImage from './assets/Rice-farming.jpg'; import cowpeaImage from './assets/Cowpea-farming.jpg'; import DryseasonImage from './assets/Dry-season-farming.jpg'; import fruitImage from './assets/fruit-farm.jpg'; import VegetableImage from './assets/Vegetable-farm.jpg'; import cashImage from './assets/cash-crop.jpeg'; import SeedImage from './assets/Seed-farm.jpg'; import consultImage from './assets/consult-farm.jpg'; const App = () => { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const handleSearchChange = (event) => { setSearchQuery(event.target.value); }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome To
Farmers Helpline

{/* Search Bar Section */}
{searchQuery && (
  • How to farm maize in southern kaduna
  • How to farm rice in samaru zaria
  • How to farm cowpea in birini-gwari
)}
{/* Featured Search Section */}

Featured Search


Rice Farming

How to farm rice in Nigeria.

Cowpea Farming

How to farm Cowpea in Nigeria.

Dry Season Farming

Explore dry season farming in Nigeria.

{/* Categories Section */}

Farming Categories

Fruits

Learn about different types of fruits and how to grow them.

Cash Crops

Get tips and advice on growing valuable cash crops.

Seeds

Discover the importance of quality seeds for successful farming.

Vegetables

Learn how to grow a variety of vegetables for your farm.

{/* What We Do Section */}

What We Do

Consultation

We provide expert consultation for all types of farming.

Training

We offer hands-on training for farmers on best practices.

Supply of Inputs

We supply high-quality seeds, fertilizers, and tools.

Market Linkages

We help farmers connect with markets for their produce.

); }; export default App;
